name: Way of the Open Hand
description: Monks of the Open Hand are masters of unarmed combat, manipulating enemies' bodies and ki.

3.name: Open Hand Technique
3.description: When you hit with Flurry of Blows, impose effects such as knocking the target prone, pushing it 15 feet, or preventing reactions.

6.name: Wholeness of Body
6.description: As an action, regain hit points equal to three times your monk level once per long rest.

11.name: Tranquility
11.description: After a long rest, gain the sanctuary spell's effect until the start of your next long rest or until broken.

17.name: Quivering Palm
17.description: Spend 3 ki points to set up lethal vibrations in a creature; later use an action to either reduce it to 0 hit points or deal 10d10 necrotic damage on a successful save.
